lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The "laundering" of drug and "insider dealing" money and controversy over accounts of the ousted Philippine and Haitian Presidents have hurt the standing of Swiss banks recently and strained international relations, particularly with the United States.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The role of lawyers has been at the centre of long running discussions on the renewal of the so-called "convention of diligence," a voluntary code of banking conduct introduced in response to a major banking scandal here in 1977.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: With secrecy back in the public eye due to the Ferdinand Marcos case and a Swiss bank link to the recently busted "Pizza Connection" international heroin ring, officials at the Banking Commission said earlier this year they wanted a tightening of rules on anonymity.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The "laundering" of drug and "insider dealing" money and controversy over accounts of the ousted Philippine and Haitian Presidents have hurt the standing of Swiss banks recently and strained international relations, particularly with the United States.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The role of lawyers has been at the centre of long running discussions on the renewal of the so-called "convention of diligence," a voluntary code of banking conduct introduced in response to a major banking scandal here in 1977.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: With secrecy back in the public eye due to the Ferdinand Marcos case and a Swiss bank link to the recently busted "Pizza Connection" international heroin ring, officials at the Banking Commission said earlier this year they wanted a tightening of rules on anonymity.
